overview: Step-brothers Kyle Brant and Greyson Lane couldn't be more opposite to one another. Greyson is an open freak but Kyle is much more sheltered and reserved. Just looking for a quiet place to rub one out, Julian Bell is horrified to discover he's being spied on by the biggest mouth in the neighborhood, Dylan Hayes. It was Christmas Eve and Avery Jones was rustling under the tree trying to get a glimpse of his Christmas bonus. Now that he's in his senior year, Jason Reed is full of confidence. Scott Finn notices Jason's change and Jason notices that Scott is checking more than his form.
title: Toys For Twinks
